/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. A blue fence runs along the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
